content.query:
-- Create and load DimLocation table

CREATE TABLE DimLocation (
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    lat FLOAT,
    lon FLOAT,
    id NVARCHAR(100)
);
GO

INSERT INTO DimLocation (
    location,
    lat,
    lon,
    id
)
SELECT
    location,
    lat,
    lon,
    id
FROM 
    ExternalWeather;
GO
